meanings.definition: Not conforming to the usual type or pattern
meanings.sent1: The atypic flower had an unusual color that stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her atypic behavior surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The atypic cat decided to meow in a different language just for fun.
meanings.sent4: His atypic taste in music was like a rare gem among the common songs.
meanings.sent5: The atypic cloud resembled a dancing dragon in the sky.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is not typical or usual
meanings.sent1: She was considered an atypic in the small town due to her unique style.
meanings.sent2: The atypic in the group always brought a fresh perspective to the team.
meanings.sent3: The atypic at the party wore a hat made of cheese, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: The atypic of the family was like a colorful bird among the ordinary sparrows.
meanings.sent5: The atypic in the painting seemed to jump out with its vibrant colors.
